properties.name: sequence.snowflake.worker-id_bits
properties.description: Snowflake worker id bits, defaultValue: 10 bits

properties.name: sequence.snowflake.worker-id.heartbeat-interval-seconds
properties.description: Snowflake workerId heartbeat interval, unit: seconds

properties.name: sequence.snowflake.worker-id.max-failed-times
properties.description: Snowflake workerId heartbeat interval max number of failures, workerId maxEffectiveSeconds = heartbeat-interval-seconds * max-failed-times
